name: Consilium
tagline: IT designed to fit your business
description: Since its beginnings in 1998, Consilium has grown by working with our customers to help them improve their businesses and making the most of their IT resources. We are a company led by technology, and our goal to deliver workable and supportable solutions that meet the needs of the business has led to our position as a significant player in the IT Sector with an enviable reputation and excellent client retention rate.
